resources.string: Jesus, I praise you for being the personification of perfect holiness in a sinful world. God, help me possess the sensitivity to hate what you hate, to promptly recognize each of my sins today, to immediately repent and to live transparently before you.
God, you have existed from everlasting to everlasting. Give me the wisdom to live my life in light of eternity and to abide in you. (Psalm 41:13; 90:2).

God, thank you for imparting the righteousness of Christ upon me (Romans 3:22). Holy Spirit, enable me today and every day to live in light of my position as a new creation. Cleanse me and make me a slave of righteousness!
God, I praise you that you are absolutely faithful, reliable and truthful. Give me the wisdom to trust you with all details of my day today, from the smallest detail to my greatest dreams.

God, thank you for being absolutely loving and wanting to experience me and have me more fully experience you. Today, grant me the ability to delight in all the beautiful provisions you have so lovingly bestowed upon me. Psalm 36:7 How priceless is your unfailing love, O God! People take refuge in the shadow of your wings.

God, the creator and ruler of all things in the universe, you are in control of all matters. Grant me the wisdom today to trust in you sovereignty accomplishing your purposes and give me reminders throughout the day of my accountability to you lest I become prideful, critical, or lacking in reverence or contentment.
God, I am grateful your mercies are new each morning. (Lamentations 3:22-23). Increase my wisdom today that I might fear you. Help me to live this day in the awareness of your presence.

God, I praise you for your continual presence and pray that I might have a more conscious and fully integrated enjoyment of delighting in you. Today, grant me wisdom to walk openly, honestly and transparently before you. (Psalm 139)

God, I worship you in your awesome power and pray that you would enable me to develop and appropriate trust and fear of you as well as a complete dependence upon your strength for each detail of this day, small and great.

God, you are perfect in every way. Today, let me fix my focus and efforts on you and your perfect desires for my life. (Psalm 90:2)\n\n \"Every good thing given and every perfect gift is from above, coming down from the Father of lights, with whom there is no variation or shifting shadow.\" (James 1:17).

God, you are the source of invaluable wisdom and provide the only basis and benchmark for me to possess true wisdom. Today, give me the wisdom to see my life from your point of view, to select the best goals for my life, and to live skillfully before you.\n\n Proverbs 1:7 \"The fear of the LORD is the beginning of knowledge , but fools despise wisdom and instruction.\"

God, thank you for revealing your divine nature in human form in Christ Jesus. Continue to reveal yourself to me and give me a heart that desires to know and love you far above and beyond all other things. (I Peter 1:8).
Lord, I praise you that you alone are the living water for my thirst and that your Spirit dwells within me. Help me to worship You in spirit and truth, with my innermost being. (John 4:24; 7:38).

Today LORD, I praise you that you are gracious! Remind me to abide in your abounding grace, knowing it is sufficient for me deepest need. \"Therefore let us draw near with confidence to the throne of grace, so that we may receive mercy and find grace to help in time of need.\" Hebrews 4:16
God, you are the source of every good thing. Let the longings and thirsts of my heart be completely satisfied in You. (Psalm 16:2)
